about_the_game:
The first A Place in the West soundtrack features 9 original pieces of ambient and instrumental music created by Chris Jolley and directly inspired by Half-Life: A Place in the West. Chris's previous credits as an audio engineer / composer include games such as Assassin's Creed Chronicles (China, Russia, and India), Runescape, Bloodforge, Harry Potter & The Deathly Hallows (I & II), and Silent Hill: Shattered Memories. With A Place in the West's soundtrack Chris has composed more than a half hour of music to capture the mystery and intrigue of New Franklin.

Track Listing
1) New Franklin Part I (2:33)
2) Amb I (1:33)
3) Modern Major General (4:44)
4) Missing Children (New Franklin Part II) (4:28)
5) Amb II (1:38)
6) The Ubdisha Part I and II (6:50)
7) This Winter (2:49)
8) Amb III (1:36)
9) Ghosts (4:14)

All files are in MP3 format (at 192kbs), and will be downloaded to your Half-Life: A Place in the West folder in the Steam Directory ../Steam/steamapps/common/Half-Life: A Place in the West/Soundtrack
